bibl.title: The Town of Syene. Report on the 5th and 6th Season in Aswan. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Joint mission of the Swiss Institute of Architectural and Archaeological Research Cairo and the Inspectorate of Aswan of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, 2004-2006. - See in part. pp. 314-338: W.M., IV. Excavations in the town centre from the Late Period to Late Roman times (Area 15); - 338-344: F.M.A. and W.M., V. Roman cemetery and Islamic suburb north of the ancient town (Areas 21, 24, 25); - 344: C.v.P., VI. A pier of the 7th century AD (Area 20); - 344-351: S.M.-K., VII. The pottery assemblage of a cellar in House 2 / Area 13 (1st century AD); - 351-D.K.: 356, VIII. Class finds from the fill of cellar 4-13-45.
bibl.seg: VON PILGRIM Cornelius, Daniel KELLER, Stefanie MARTIN-KILCHER, Fahmi MAHMOUD EL-AMIN and Wolfgang MÜLLER, in Collaboration with Mohamed EL-BIALY and Mohi ED-DIN MUSTAFA, The Town of Syene. Report on the 5th and 6th Season in Aswan. Avec résumé en anglais.

Joint mission of the Swiss Institute of Architectural and Archaeological Research Cairo and the Inspectorate of Aswan of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, 2004-2006. - See in part. pp. 314-338: W.M., IV. Excavations in the town centre from the Late Period to Late Roman times (Area 15); - 338-344: F.M.A. and W.M., V. Roman cemetery and Islamic suburb north of the ancient town (Areas 21, 24, 25); - 344: C.v.P., VI. A pier of the 7th century AD (Area 20); - 344-351: S.M.-K., VII. The pottery assemblage of a cellar in House 2 / Area 13 (1st century AD); - 351-D.K.: 356, VIII. Class finds from the fill of cellar 4-13-45.
von Pilgrim Keller Martin-Kilcher Mahmoud el-Amin Müller el-Bialy ed-Din Mustafa
